fulltext:
An Truong Le 
Mobile and Frontend Technical, Project Management 
PERSONAL INFORMATION 
Name                                   An Truong Le 
Academic Title                     Bachelor 
Function                               Technical, Project Management 
Date of birth                         04.02.1982 
PERSONAL SUMMARY   
With over 10 years experience as front-end developer, I have implemented UIs for a variety of 
projects in e-commerce, project management tools, mobile application about sales force 
automation, web games and remote desktop system on mobile. 
During my years of developing as front-end and full stack developer, I have advanced skills in 
HTML5/CSS/JavaScript and earned intermediate skills in CSS/JavaScript libraries and frameworks 
such as: react native, reactjs, angularjs, KendoUI, Daypilot Scheduler, Gridster, Highchart, Less, 
Saas, Gruntjs. 
EDUCATION 
2000 - 2005                    Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology  
Bachelor of Information Technology 
2003  
Kent CBAM 
Graphic and Web Design 
2006  
Aptech  
International Programmer 
SKILLS 
Programming skills 
PHP, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Typescript, Mootools, ExtJs, Sencha 
touch, Angularjs, Angular2, Reactjs, JCanvaScript, JsPlump, 
Bootstrap, Gridlex. Day Pilot Library. 
Language skills 
Intermediate in understanding, speaking and writing English. 
Trait 
Good Communication and Collaborative skills, Determined and 
hardworking, self-motivated, punctual, high adaptability, constantly 
improving 
Working Process 
Agile, Lean, Scrum & Kanban, Waterfall 
Tools 
Sublime Text, Visual Studio Code, Assembla, Jira, WebEx, Git, MS 
SQL, Notepad++ 
Platforms 
Windows, Linux 
CAREER SUMMARY 
06.2017 – Currently Zinimedia 
Technical, Project Management 
Mobile Development:  
React Native with Expo platform, React Native, HTML5, CSS3, 
jQuery, Gruntjs, Bootstrap, Less, Lodash. 
Projects based Wordpress Development:  
Sharktank, Topchef, Pizza Company, … 
Backend Development:  
Sailsjs, ES6, Bootstrap, Less, Lodash, HTML5, CSS3, jQuery. 
Description: 
Over 2 years on developing UI/UX of mobile application, backend 
api development. 
Projects: 
HipencilTV:  
- 
Information: Mobile application about cartoon and short 
film for kids and everyone, introduce character stuff of 
store. 
- 
React Native technologies: Animations, Notifications, 
Camera and Photos, Permissions, Facebook and Google 
login and sharing, Image manipulator, Video, Navigation, 
Carousel 
- 
Backend techonologies: Nodejs, Sails Framework 
Ekidpro:  
- 
Information: Mobile application about Junior School 
Management. Parents and Teachers can see information 
of Food, Scheduler, Health of children, Activities Albums, 
Tuition, News and Notification, everyday Leaving and 
Attendence, Chat for instance information. 
- 
React Native technologies: Animations, Notifications, 
Camera and Photos, Permissions, Facebook and Google 
login and sharing, Image manipulator, Navigation, 
Carousel 
- 
Backend techonologies: Nodejs, Sails Framework. 
Zapes:  
- 
Information: Mobile application about Blog and News, 
watch news, read news, share news. 
- 
React Native technologies: Animations, Permissions, 
Facebook and Google login and sharing, Camera and 
Photos, Image manipulator, Video, Navigation, Carousel 
- 
Backend techonologies: Wordpress API. 
Aotom:  
- 
Information: Mobile application about shrimp producers 
gain real-time visibility into their farm operations. App 
provides a live operations dashboard view of pond status, 
shrimp growth, and allows producers to proactively 
manage risk like never before. 
- 
React Native technologies: Animations, Permissions, 
Calendar, Image manipulator, Camera and Photos, 
Navigation, Carousel, Chart, Google Analytics, Google 
maps. 
- 
Backend techonologies: Nodejs, Sails Framework. 
Family Diary:  
- 
Information: Mobile application about small family 
relationship like facebook. User can make relation ship 
with family members, share photo and album, comments 
and chat each other, view family chart. 
- 
React Native technologies: Animations, Permissions, 
Calendar, Image manipulator, Camera and Photos, 
Navigation, Carousel.  
- 
Backend techonologies: Django 
10.2015 – 06.2017 
bbv Vietnam 
Senior Front-end Developer  
Web Development with:  
Front-End :  
HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, Reactjs, Gruntjs, Angular 1, highcharts, 
gridster, Daypilot Scheduler, Angular 2, Bootstrap, Less, Bacon, 
Underscore, jasmin. 
Description 
1.5 years on customizing library and implementing 3 modules for 
Project Management Product: 
Widget and Dashboard: a new module to improve and 
enhance the usability and UI features managing widget 
on a grid UI include: drag&drop and resizing widget in a 
grid. Widget could be: 
● 
Interactive charts widget: to show data 
visualization on chart, display and update charts 
● 
Button widget: a button to access directly to page 
by URL. 
● 
Self-defined button widget: a button which user 
define with URL to access directly to page. 
● 
Menu widget: a menu button which includes some 
items in dropdown list, each item could access link 
to a page like button widget. 
Scheduler: a new module to enhance the task 
management pages by managing events on schedule to 
provide users more interactions on managing all kind of 
tasks. Such interactions include: move event, 
extend/reduce event duration, manage event status, 
show progressive status, availability of resources and 
data validation on each action as loading, creating, 
updating, deleting events. Detail as 
● 
Custom Daypilot Scheduler library to adapt with 
current workflow and status. 
● 
Implement to replicate existed features. 
● 
Develop new task management functionalities. 
Sidebar: a new sidebar which could manage and include 
all kind widgets as dashboard could do, the difference is 
sidebar could be pin, unpin. resize to provide user more 
space on the screen. The challenge is to  rest of screen 
will be impact: more space or less space when sidebar is 
resize 
3 months in implementation Web shop UI for automotive 
business company. 
05.2015 – 10.2015 
Nahi 
UI/UX Leader 
Manage team and research new technology such as Expressjs 
and Restify. 
Web Development with:  
Front-End: jQuery, React, Bootstrap, Sass. 
Back-End: PHP, Kohana framework, single page application 
Description 
Implement UI framework about educational game for kids. 
It is a single page web game to attract kids on learning by 
playing game such as puzzle, Q&A, play video, collect items 
(star, diamonds). It could be run on web mobile and web 
desktop. 
08.2013 – 05.2015 
Fsoft 
Senior Software Engineer 
Mobile development with jQuery, Sencha Touch, Bootstrap, 
Angularjs 
Description 
More than 1.5 years on designing and implementing UI for  
mobile application about Sales force automation (SFA).  
This is solution that automates business tasks such as sales 
processing, and tracking of customer interactions, as well as 
analyzing sales forecasts and performance for the companies of 
FMCG, Consumer Goods, Food & Beverage, Pharmacy and Oil 
industries 
01.2013 – 08.2013 
Global Cybersoft 
Senior Front-end Developer 
Mobile development with jQuery, Sencha Touch. 
Description 
Design and implement Remote Desktop System on devices. 
The Remote Desktop System extends the printer’s production 
environment to the customer’s desktop.  
It provides customer on running approval workflow, for designer 
on following appropriate for output status, and for printing 
company on document revision management. 
02.2012 – 01.2013 
Freelancer Group 
Senior Full Stack Developer 
Web development with PHP - Kohana framework. 
Description 
Work together with freelancer group.  
Implement on some outsource Projects.  
Make responsive design on mobile. 
08.2011 – 02.2012 
Beyond Edge 
Team leader of web UI department 
Web development with jquery, canvas, HTML5, Bootstrap, 
HighChart, GraphicJS. 
Description 
Plan and make solution for all javascript Issues in website. 
Split task and assign to team member. 
Research new technical javascript to draw chart using canvas, 
HTML5 such as such as HighChart, GraphicJS. 
07.2008 – 08.2011 
Sutrix Solutions 
Javascript Developer 
Web development with mootools, jquery, ExtJs. 
Description 
Plan and make solution for all javascript problems in website. 
Make effect and animations of menu, popup layer, photo gallery, 
drag drop product. 
Support php developer on PHP and javascript. 
Research and apply javascript libraries in project such as: 
mootools, jquery, ExtJs. 
Theme and align layout of some javascript  plugin to integrate 
Google api, facebook pluggins. 
01.2007 – 07.2008 
Cube Join Stock Company 
Full Stack Developer 
Web development with PHP, Zend framework. 
Description 
Ecommerce shop portal website about online store and shopping 
cart 
such as store management, category management, good 
management, cart management. 
Implement 2 modules category management, good 
management, align layout and theming css.
